_header: Saint Luke the gospeller will say
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4684.
_description: Gospel for the Fourteenth Sunday after Trinity in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte luke þe gospellere gan saieIn oure gospell of to
                    daie…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Of a preste þat þorghe his folieffell in þe
                    synne of liccherie
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Luc þe gospelere wol sayIn vre gospel of to
                    day…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And neuere mihte forȝiuenesse haueTil he him of synne
                    schraue
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Dum iret Ihesu in Jerusalem transibatur per (f.
                    205rc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Luk þe godspellere wille vs sayIn oure godspelle of
                    þis day…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Þat may ȝe by a tale here seÞat I wille telle
                    & ȝe here me
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica xiiia post festum trinitatis secundum lucam (p.
                    282)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Luke Euangelist wile sayin oure Gospel as þis
                    dayWhan crist walkid in manhede…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& neuere forȝifnes myhte hauetil he him of his synne
                    schraue
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica 14a post festum sancte trinitatis Euangelium
                        secundum Lucam (f. 181v)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
SEint luc þe gospeler wol sayIn vre gospel of to
                    day…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…And neuer miht forȝiuensse haueTil he hym of synne
                    schraue
BLAdd22283.Attributed Title:
Dum nec Ihesus in Ierulsalem transibat per (f.
                    10rb)
BLAdd22283.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).
         2014; http://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Add_MS_22283.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saint luke þe gospeller gone sayeIn oure gospell of to
                    daye…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…That neuer myȝte forgyfnes haueOr he of his synne hyme
                    schraue

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt Luke þe gospellere wyll sayIn oure gospell of þis
                    dayeþat when Criste welbe in his manhede…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…and neuer myght for gyffnes haueare he of hys syne hym
                    schrafe

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint Luc þe gospellere woll sayIn oure gospell off þis
                    day…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…And neuyr moght forgifnys haueAr he hym of his syn
                    schraue
HunHM129.Attributed Title:
Dominica quarta decima post festum trinitatis (f.
                    149v)
